attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wish to bring to the attention of the Prime Minister the dismay and alarm that the elderly vulnerable residents of Sheltered Housing view the removal of site based Wardens and their replacement by Floating Support staff. We cordially petition him to remove Sheltered Housing from the budgets of Supporting People and return this type of housing to the general needs list

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
